name: Where'd my socks go?
description:
Where'd My Socks Go?

A game I made in a few weeks about finding your lost socks.

Look around the apartment for any lost socks.

Once you find a sock place it into the laundry basket.

Find all of the socks to win.

Download the Desktop version for the best performance!!!

Controls

WASD to move.

When looking at an object press the LEFT mouse button to pick it up.

Follow my twitter for more games in the future

 https://twitter.com/samc0leman

Credits:

Assets used:

Fantasy Skybox  (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/fantasy-skybox-f...)

Better Minimal WebGL Template (https://seansleblanc.itch.io/better-minimal-webgl-template)

Royalty free music & sound effects:

Sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com & https://mixkit.co/
